# f5xc_filter_set (Resource)

Create specification

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_filter_set" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the FilterSet. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the FilterSet will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `context_key` (String) Context Key. indexable context key that identifies a page or page type for which the FilterSet is applicable Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
- `filter_fields` (Block List) Filter Fields. list of fields and their values selected by the user Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.min_items: 1 ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.unique: true (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter_fields))
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

<a id="nestedblock--filter_fields"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter_fields`

Optional:

- `date_field` (Block, Optional) Filter Date/Time Range Field. either an absolute time range or a relative time interval (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter_fields--date_field))
- `field_id` (String) Field ID. an identifier for the field that maps to some UI filter component Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
- `filter_expression_field` (Block, Optional) Filter Expression Field. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter_fields--filter_expression_field))
- `string_field` (Block, Optional) Filter String Field. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter_fields--string_field))

<a id="nestedblock--filter_fields--date_field"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter_fields.date_field`

Optional:

- `absolute` (Block, Optional) Date Range. Date range is for selecting a date range (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter_fields--date_field--absolute))
- `relative` (String) Relative. Exclusive with [absolute] relative time duration

<a id="nestedblock--filter_fields--date_field--absolute"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter_fields.date_field.absolute`

Optional:

- `end_date` (String) End Date. Contains end date Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
- `start_date` (String) Start Date. Contains start date Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true



<a id="nestedblock--filter_fields--filter_expression_field"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter_fields.filter_expression_field`

Optional:

- `expression` (String) Expression Value. expression is a kubernetes style label expression for selections, but differs in that it allows special characters in the keys and values Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true


<a id="nestedblock--filter_fields--string_field"></a>
### Nested Schema for `filter_fields.string_field`

Optional:

- `field_values` (List of String) String Value(s). Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_filter_set.example system/example
```
